Mission Statement:
The educational goals were set by the school’s owner in 2003, and are continuously restructured to ensure each student will receive the appropriate amount of training within the 1000 NYS clock hour cosmetology course to obtain and sustain successful employment.
The school facilitates this by way of offering a quaint school environment ten students in the classroom.
Education will be provided with an appropriate balance of essential learner friendly lesson plans within theory and practical skill. Thereafter, the school’s ability to bridge a student’s classroom training into the school’s student salon will allow students to receive real world familiarity.
As a graduate of the school; you will be prepared with the fundamentals to enter into employment as a junior stylist along with the ability to take the NYS exams to obtain a permanent cosmetology license.
Thank you for viewing the school’s website.

School & Class Schedule:
Scheduled school and class hours are; Tuesday - Friday 9:00am – 5:10pm. 8 hours a day, 32 hours a week, approximately 32weeks therefore, approximately 8 months to complete.
Entrance Requirements:
A potential student must have a high school diploma or a GED certificate prior to enrolling at the school.
Orientation:
Please call to make an appointment with Ms Ann to visit the school.
The next class will start on May 15, 2012
